title: Himi 653
lyrics:
8.7.8.7.
1.
‘Eiki tali ‘eku kole
‘Oku fai he houa ni!
Tafi ‘eku hia ke mole,
Teuteu au ki hēvani.
2.
Kuo loa ‘ete holi
Ki he nofo haohaoa;
Taa’i hoto loto kovi,
Mo e ‘atamai mūnoa.
3.
Hono nifi ‘eku tangi
‘I he ngaahi me’a ta’etaau
‘Oku fa’a hā ki Langi
‘O nau fakamaa’i au.
4.
‘Oiauē ‘a e ngaahi fili
‘Oku fa’a tuli mai;
Pea te nofo he taili
Ki ha me’a ‘e hoko ai.
5.
Kuo u tali tu’u ke toto
‘I he’enau ‘oho mai;
Ka pāhia hoku loto
‘I he fai mo toe fai.
6.
‘Oku ou tautapa atu
Sīsū e, tokoni mai!
‘Omi kelesi pe ma’aku
Pea u maikuna ai.*
C.P.W.B.
